name: Basicare Makeup Sponges
description: Provides smooth blending and even application for liquid, cream and powder foundation. With its fine texture, this sponge offers maximum control and a flawless finish to your cosmetic application. CARE: Gently wash the sponge in warm soapy water. Rinse thoroughly and squeeze for excess water. Allow it to air dry.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
